name: Malarlio
description:
A short game about playing as everyone's favorite Spanish plumber: Malarlio. This game is definitely not inspired in any way by any sort of other game. I swear. Especially not a game made by a certain Japanese company. That would be crazy.

Use the up arrow to jump, and the right arrow to switch the current character once you have a high enough score. If you close the tab, your score and characters will be reset!
